entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
